mapper.insert: INSERT INTO residentReserv (userId, itemId, date, time, available) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{date}, #{time}, #{available})
mapper.select: select userId,itemId,date,time,available from residentReserv where userId = #{userId} and itemId=#{itemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM residentReserv WHERE userId = #{userId} and itemId=#{itemId} and date=#{date} and #time={time}
